div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2373 Cadenet, 30 km. N of Aix, 1869 (176) Burial: mid 2nd cent. B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 1800 AR. Pot hoard Massalia: dr. Disposition: Marseille (part); de Saulcy (part) de la Saussaye, RN 1860, pp. 485-90 Carpentin, RN 1861, pp. 397-406, illus. Blanchet, Trait√©, p. 597, no. 250 bis
